27686.<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「こ:

27687.<start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「ソ: <start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>Somya, I'm glad you came too.<stop_lip_animation n00422 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27688.<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「う:

27689.<start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「ソ:

27690.<start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「よ:

27691.<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「え: <start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Eh? Oh, no. Me.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27692.<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Thank you, Momma. But I decline your

27693.<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「ひ:

27694.<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「も:

27696.<start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>You are strong. Such a small body is

27697.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「そ: <start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>I see. That's right!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27698.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ひ:

27700.<start_lip_sync n00422 _normal m00001>「よ:
